name: Sovereign Lands - A Story
description:
Sovereign Lands is a world war one shooter currently in development by LazyCouchGames. This exciting new shooter doesn't follow the stereotypes of other shooters based in the past. Our shooter focuses more on the negatives of the player. The player will be given a unique experience from the character's eyes. Our character 'John Mitchell' is an average lad who lives at home with his parents. He was never the popular guy or the good looking guy, he just wanted to join the army. John's father was a soldier before him. Inspired by his father's bravery John decides to join up. Upon joining up John realises the mistake he has made. During the game you will notice clear signs of struggle from all kinds of different characters.

We have been working on Assets and Intro Scenes and what not. Below you can see some screenshots of early work.
